DOC.brief_title: Follow-up Psychological Neurocognitive Gulf War Outcome : Relation Stress
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 800 deploy 250 nondeployed veteran originally administer psychological assessment instrument shortly cessation Gulf War . These veteran currently follow evaluate longer-term psychological outcome relation war-zone stress , intervene life stress , individual difference factor personal resource , cop social support . Approximately 75 veteran , oversampled post-traumatic stress disorder , administer specialized neuropsychological battery emphasize attention memory . This sample also follow evaluate longitudinal neuropsychological outcome relation PTSD status . A cross-sectional study also conduct examine visual , hierarchical attention relation PTSD diagnosis .
